message: Please tell us what are your favorite Google Chrome extensions? include the ones that you are using regularly as well as the ones that are cool no matter how much you use them or how popular they are.

data.message:
extensions:
-----------------
momentum
add to wunderlist
save to pocket
lastpass
live reload
ip address, domain information
colorzilla
page ruler
php error alert
hasher
vimium
strong password generator
json formatter
keyboard shortcuts to reorder tabs
live on
hangouts
omg ubuntu
--- starting from here deactivated ones that i enable when i want ---
awesome screenshot (there are other good alternatives as well)
backbone debugger
browserstack
ember inspector
marionette inspector
corporate ipsum
var_dumbling
the great suspender
and few others deactivated..

chrome applications:
------------------------------
postman
sunrise calendar
wunderlist for chrome
google keep
slack deck
image tool
lockify app
draw.io desktop
authy
minimalist markdown editor
pocket
pixlr touch up
caret (i am keeping it deactivated because i dont use it, but its a very good editor)
polarr photo editor (deactivated as well)
and a few others deactivated as well that i rarely use...
^ And the winner of "So you think you can exhaust your RAM" is here :D

.
SearchBar : https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/fjefgkhmchopegjeicnblodnidbammed

LastPass : https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/lastpass-free-password-ma/hdokiejnpimakedhajhdlcegeplioahd

streamkeys : http://www.streamkeys.com/

MultiLogin : https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/multilogin/nccllfnllopfpcbjdgjdlfmomnfgnnbk

OneTab : https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/onetab/chphlpgkkbolifaimnlloiipkdnihall

Pushbullet : https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/chlffgpmiacpedhhbkiomidkjlcfhogd?utm_source=chrome-app-launcher-info-dialog

Vysor : https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/vysor-beta/gidgenkbbabolejbgbpnhbimgjbffefm?utm_source=chrome-app-launcher-info-dialog

Hover Zoom : taken down from Chrome Store
Pushbullet especially if you're using Android Phone, just make sure you enable end to end encryption.
